name: Rosebuds...Stained Glass Suncatcher
description:
Pink roses are said to represent grace, perfect happiness and thankfulness
Rosebuds represent love unwakened

Handcrafted Tiffany style...hand cut glass, smoothed on a glass grinder, copper foiled and soldered. Two rings for hanging and a generous length of fishing line is attached.

Beautiful pale pink iridized wispy glass and deep green lightly textured glass. Ever changing colors as shown in the pictures. Very nice gift idea for Mothers Day, birthday, shower or just treat yourself! 

Approx. 11 1/4" w x 4 1/4" h 46 pieces of glass

If you like this piece but prefer a different color simply convo me! I'm sure we can find the perfect color to match your decor! Custom orders are always welcome!! Thanks for looking!

name: Fresh as a Daisy...Stained Glass Suncatcher Panel
description:
Daisy... Innocence, Loyal love, I'll never tell, Purity 

This panel is handcrafted Tiffany style...each piece of glass is hand cut, smoothed on a glass grinder, copper foiled and soldered. Framed in zinc came. A black patina is applied to the solder lines and frame. Two rings attached for hanging. Heavy fishing line included.

White/clear wispy, pure green lightly textured and pale blue transparent glass was used in this piece.

A very bright Spring inspired piece will look beautiful in any window. A great gift idea for Mothers Day!!! Please convo any questions...Thanks and have a great day!

Approx. 8" w x 10" h

name: SALE Pastel Glass Nugget Wine Glass Charms Set of 5
description:
Wine glass charms in pastel colors...each one is hand made with soft pliable lead free metal and assorted pastel nuggets...five in all. All the nuggets are clear based with a swirl of color...orange, aqua, yellow, blue and green. Each one can be bent to fit almost any wine glass stem. 

Perfect stocking stuffer, gift basket addition, shower gift, housewarming or a gift for yourself!!! Please convo me any questions or comments! Custom orders are always welcome! Convo me for multiple orders! Thanks for looking!

Approx 2" L x 1 1/2" w

name: Pale Green Glass Nugget Peace Sign Suncatcher
description:
Peace sign in pale green glass oval nuggets, handcrafted freestyle using copper foil and lead free solder. Two jump rings for hanging with a length of heavy duty fishline attached.
A one of a kind piece!!

These nuggets are green glass, NOT painted glass. The finish is left silvertone. Beautiful in your sunniest window!

If you like this piece but would prefer a different color, convo me...several colors are available.

Great Mother's Day, Birthday or anyday gift idea! Order early for guaranteed delivery...

approx 7 1/2" dia.

name: Tiffany Style Pink Celtic Knot Heart Stained Glass Suncatcher
description:
Pink and clear Celtic Knot Heart stained glass is crafted Tiffany style...each piece is hand cut glass, copper foiled and soldered using lead free solder. The solder lines are left silver tone for extra shine. This piece is constructed of clear 'sparkle' glass and a softly textured pink. 

It would make a very nice gift for your mom, sister or sweetheart! This would make a really nice 'Breast Cancer Awareness' gift!

**Custom Orders Always Welcome** If you see something in my store but would prefer a differant color...convo me!

Approx. 7" x 8"
